data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the ant (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) genus Paraparatrechina in the Afrotropical and Malagasy Regions

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lapolla, John S., Cheng, Chiu H., Fisher, Brian L. (2010): Taxonomic revision of the ant (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) genus Paraparatrechina in the Afrotropical and Malagasy Regions. Zootaxa 2387: 1-27, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193808
